social_work: Teaching students at various NGOs and interacting with them for fun activities.
Working for the betterment of disabled people like organizing cricket matches for their recreation.
Volunteering for various government organized events.

experiences.description: Reached out to 150+ people via LinkedIn, Instagram & cold mails to inform them about the initiative and compel them to contribute for the school. Built a network of influencers, journalists, NGOs and placement cells to work towards the development of the school by investing their resources and time. Gathering volunteers from various colleges and professionals to teach underprivileged students of the school and share experiences.

experiences.company_name: Shaheed Bhagat Singh College, Delhi University
experiences.description: Building and maintaining an updated database of various startups and companies. Reaching out to multiple companies to explore their interest in working with the society for mutual benefits. Onboarding interested companies and providing services like social media management, recruitment of students for internships and live project opportunities. Organized ENNOVATION 5.0, a university level B-plan competition witnessing a participation of 50+ students. Managing the organizing team of 15 people to host the event successfully. Teaching students at various NGOs and interacting with them for fun activities. Working for the betterment of disabled people like organizing cricket matches for their recreation. Volunteering for various government organized events. Organized the annual TEDx event by inviting 8 speakers like Divas Gupta, Gaurav Juyal & multiple performers from different fields. Raised sponsorship worth INR 1.5 Lacs in cash and kind by reaching out to multiple companies like Deadbeat, IIDE, Bamboo Bae, etc. Managed a crowd of 250+ people during the event and ensured the best hospitality for the invited speakers, performers and guests.

full_output.name: Hardik Bansal

Co-curricular organized by Delhi Police and secured first position.
